channel.title: Sapphyx Launcher
channel.description: A RSS dedicated to ad news.

item.title: Welcome Beta User
item.description: This is the message board. These messages come OTA and regard important articles pertaining to Sapphyx Launcher. Click here for an on boarding message over at GSD!

item.title: Bug Watch!
item.description: Users seem to be having issues toggling some settings with the round checkbox after the 05 update. If you come across this issue, try resetting the launcher data and see if the problem persist.

item.title: Google Play Ratings
item.description: Take Google Play Ratings seriously. I am watching all of your reviews and monitoring all of them. Any of them that don't meet google guidelines will be reported and/or removed.

item.title: Remember, The Beta Is Free
item.description: Please reframe from purchasing a license if you plan on just returning it. It's screws up my data poll hardcore. Purchasing a license right now, locks you in for official release but gains you nothing at the moment.

item.title: Community Challenge
item.description: Reach 20k downloads before the end of August with an average of a 4.0 rating scale and as a reward, Sapphyx Premium will go free for a week. Help make that happen!

item.title: Services Update!
item.description: Updates are now available for Premium and Onyx License keys as well as Sapphyx Service Pack. These are now fully supported for Sapphyx 2!

item.title: XDA Forum
item.description: Head on over to the XDA Forums and dig in with some good ol discussions. Just broke the 1k views mark! Now... We need some general discussion started. Help make that happen!

item.title: Like A Pro
item.description: Unlock the premium features everyone's talking about by purchasing the Premium License!

item.title: Be Onyx
item.description: Unlock every single feature everyone's talking about forever by purchasing an Onyx License! This is a step up from Premium.

item.title: Sapphyx SP2
item.description: A launcher exclusive service pack that enhances the Sapphyx Launcher experience. V2 now available! Supportive Backing now live!

item.title: Join The Community
item.description: Join the Google Plus Group for group discussion, request, 1 on 1 bug discussions, and support from the community who started it all.

item.title: Join Hangouts
item.description: Join the Hangouts Group for group discussion, request, 1 on 1 bug discussions, and support from the community.

item.title: GocalSD Home
item.description: The home of Sapphyx Launcher and other great projects.

item.title: Telegram Group
item.description: Get support from the Telegram group or discuss the current project operations!
